body.content:
Attention.

Your compensation funds for the failed transaction you had in the
totaling $2,200,000 ( Two million Two hundred Thousand Dollars ) has
been approved by government for release to you .

Confirm the following information so that we can proceed with the funds release.

You full name ,

Nationality,

house address,

phone number ,

occupation,

age ,

Sex,

Marital status,

Send also any scanned copy of your id.

I expect your prompt message to this effect so that we can proceed
with the process of the funds release and transfer to you.

Dr. J. Lawrence
Federal reserve bank.
